name: How Aerial Photography Works
description:
This video was made possible by Edmonton Regional Helicopters - visit them at https://www.erhelicopters.com for more information.

Over the past several months, you may have seen quite a few aerial photos of stored aircraft all over the world. But these are taken while directly over an active airport, how's that possible?

Today, I go behind the scenes with Edmonton Regional Helicopters to find out!
